categories: Category:Cut content from Battle of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Darth Tigran was a male Zabrak Sith Lord. He wielded a red-bladed lightsaber and wore a red and gray cloak.

Darth Tigran was a proposed character for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords, which was being developed by Red Fly Studio around 2011. Concept art for the character was published by artist Thomas A. Szakolczay on his ArtStation profile.
